titles.title: FOR VETS Act of 2013
Formerly Owned Resources for Veterans to Express Thanks for Service Act of 2013
A bill to amend title 40, United States Code, to improve veterans service organizations access to Federal surplus personal property.
FOR VETS Act of 2013

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: Formerly Owned Resources for Veterans to Express Thanks for Service Act of 2013 or the FOR VETS Act of 2013 - Authorizes the transfer of federal surplus property to a state agency for distribution through donation within the state for purposes of education or public health for organizations whose membership comprises substantially veterans and whose representatives are recognized by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs (VA) in the preparation, presentation, and prosecution of claims under laws administered by the Secretary.
